title: Is Selena Gomez a good singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Selena Gomez is not only a great singer, but also an example to follow  The actress and singer Selena Gomez is recognized worldwide as one of the most famous Disney actresses of the moment or for having been the girlfriend of singer Justin Bieber, but the actress does not need anyone to shine on her own. She made her television debut when she was 7 years old on the Barney and Friends Show and has never stopped wowing the world with her performances ever since. But not only that, Selena Gomez has always stood out for being one of the most altruistic artists in the industry. And although in 2013 she put a little hiatus in her career after being diagnosed with Lupus, she has always faced everything with a smile. Here we share some of the things for which Selena Gomez is a unique artist and one of our favorites. Inspire millions  Selena Gomez participated in a 2008 campaign called "UR Votes Count," in which she encouraged more than 50,000 teenagers to learn about the candidates for the presidential election that year. I create your own foundation  Selena Gomez donated a large amount of money to the Keck School of Medicine at the University of Southern California, to create the Lupus Research program, which continues to create research on lupus and its possible cure. Selena has never stopped looking to help and try to do her bit by helping others. READ MORE:
